name: untilyouaresonude
text: Doesn't even bother to question it...just closes his eyes and awaits oblivion.

name: apocowarg
text: The fact that Phillipe starts new conversations with "I am happy to talk to you." is so goddamned cute it makes my eyes squinty.

text:
I'M SO SORRY FOR SAYING THE STRIP WOULD BE THE SAME WITHOUT YOU, DR. KISSES! I'M SO SO SORRY

PLEASE FORGIVE ME

text: good sir, ray was one of the three mentioned in the first post

name: luckypyjamas
text:
first post of this whole chain of comments wherein we can see how many achewood characters we can name

what the hell

name: mxh
text: Lie Bot. I mean, how can you forget him? He's in this very strip.

I... I'ma do it...

THESE KNIVES

name: saucy_jack
text:
I'd probably enjoy Achewood as much if it were just Philippe, Lyle, Nice Pete and the robots.

But I guess that would be horrible for Philippe.

name: deusoma
text:
All crying himself to sleep every night.
All receiving punches to the gut and tear-inducing stories as presents on every major holiday.
No sir, that would not be much good for Phillipe.

name: scura
text: he's so brave.

name: deimosrising
text: The last is my favorite Phillipe panel.

name: spannthony
text: I really enjoy where Phillipe takes this. Good ole Lie Bot.

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tttt2, Zem, stoned_lightning)

name: owen
text: i have imagined myself into death before, and it was exactly like this. when you die there's really nothing you can do but accept it.

name: spanntastic
text: Only Phillipe could do this

name: ssddr
text: Another example of phillipe's extreme pessimism.

name: gompo
text: Jesus often contacts those waiting outside the Berlin Sex Museum.

name: invidious
text: Like shootin' fish in a barrel.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Philipe is ready to go. He has lived a full five years.

name: straw
text: This was one of my earliest introductions to Achewood and still a big fav

name: closefriend
text: Lie Bot's even better at his trade than he knows.

name: kledermans
text: Where are Philippe's ears?

name: earendil
text: Philippe's not afraid of death... as long as it's not incredible death

name: i_love_kate
text: I love how he's already halfway into his introduction before he realises that there's no-one there. His mother would be so proud. And in the final panel, just behaving like a good dead person...

name: woodenteeth
text: Is tapping someone on the shoulder and not being there the most eloquent lie there is... is Lie-Bot some sort of incredible avant-garde lie-genius?

name: scorpio_nadir
text: It's his programming. He can't help it.

name: carlyle
text: Phillipe lied to himself, which Lie Bot toally expected.

name: bourbonsamurai
text:
The alt text really makes this one for me- "the small otter has resigned himself to inevitable death".
I can just picture stumbling across this strip with no context, reading that, and going, "Ah."
all taking a sip of coffee and such.

name: dicklaurent
text: Lie Bot is still wearing the shoes Michael J. Fox gave him. Maybe he really did meet him. But he is an enigma still (Lie Bot, not Michael)

name: ovenface
text: man, even if philippe had good reflexes, he never would have suspected liebot. all standing 10 feet away and having rediculously long robot arms when he needs them.

name: soticoto
text: Insta-win with an extra round of awesome.

name: chachibenji
text: The look of a small stuffed otters quiet reservation in the face of eternity is astonishing.

name: tekende
text:
Why is there a sex museum in Berlin?

What...what's in it?

name: edwell
text: Over 3,000 objects are displayed on three floors, arranged according to epoch and genre. They range from the giant phallus of Bali to Biedermeier snuff-boxes and Chinese ink-wash nudes.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
This is a perfect avicon/comment symmetry post, edwell.

Why hasn't it been chubbied all to hell....

name: jezebel
text: Sex is in it.  All kinds of sex.

name: mrectomy
text: It's amazing how quickly Phillipe accepts his fate, even without trying to rationalize how it could have happened.

name: boyvirgil
text: it took three hits of acid before i discovered such peace.

name: ham_shoes
text: Philippe thinks he is dead; so in order to be polite, he keeps very still and closes his eyes.

name: kikineko
text: "Is it... is it Jesus ?" Heh, poor innocent and naive Philippe. So brave for him to accept death head on.

name: slysa
text: gid i love the liebot phillipe interactions

name: slysa
text: god*

name: drskradley
text: "Please Gid help me"

name: audry
text: i kind of feel like this strip is the best thing to hit the internets since porn.

name: noob
text: Oh man, the facial expression in the last panel is just perfect .

name: dusty
text: Some day when I see a properly shaped piece of driftwood, I will carve it like the last panel and put it by my front step. Actually I should do this with any piece of driftwood that can look like Phillipe in any of his poses at any scale. My yard would look bizarre and wonderful.

name: carlyle
text: This strip is part of the reason I do not like Phillipe as much as others.

name: random_shorts
text: Way to be a contrarian!

name: carlyle
text: Thanks. I don't know what the point you were trying to get across was so I'll take it at face-complimentary value.

name: vulpes-aurum
text: He sure is taking death rather well...

name: lolsworth
text: Some love for the first panel here. Phillipe all standing outside the sex museum being patient and such.
